name: Emblem Craft
description:
Emblem Craft is a strategy RPG created in SRPG Studio that blends elements of Minecraft and strategy role-playing. In this game you'll explore a map filled with enemies to fight and resources to gather, and with those resources, you will build houses and shops that increase the size of your army and the quality of items you can work with. There are plenty of surprises on the map, if you can find them and take advantage of them. Can you build enough houses to earn a castle for your kingdom? Explore, Exploit, Excavate and Exterminate in this experiment in strategy game design!

Created for the "Don't make Fire Emblem" contest by Markyjoe1990.
